Question: In 1963, this person' longtime rhythm section of Kelly, Chambers, and Cobb departed.
Hints: This group, which recorded in Philharmonic Hall for the album In Concert (1972), was unsatisfactory to this person.
After finishing a 27 minute recording for the armed services, this person took a break outside the club.
This was the first of many recordings this person contributed to in this period, mostly as a sideman.
